document.full_text: south korea's lg electronics inc has diversified chip suppliers for home appliance products to hynix semiconductor and panasonic away from toshiba corp after japan's devastating earthquake in last month.
document.title: lg expands chip suppliers away from toshiba after quake: source
lines_and_colors: south korea's lg electronics inc has diversified chip suppliers for home appliance products to hynix semiconductor and panasonic away from toshiba corp after japan's devastating earthquake in last month.
